mapper.insert: INSERT post(name, isAdmin, contents, createTime, views, categoryId, userId) VALUES (#{name}, #{isAdmin}, #{contents}, #{createTime}, #{views}, #{categoryId}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET name = (#{name}), contents = #{contents}, views = #{views}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, userId = #{userId}, contents = #{contents} WHERE id = (#{id})
